channel.title: Eden Adler's Personal Blog
channel.description: I'm a Software Engineer working in Tel Aviv. I'm a challenge seeker, self starter, and creative thinker.

item.title: The visual learner's guide to async JS
item.description: After my first year working as a frontend web developer, I got the idea to have my own personal site. It’d be a platform to showcase my work, share content, and serve as a creative outlet for me outside of work. Here, I’ll walk you through my experience building the site from zero to deploy.

item.title: From Zero to Deploy: how I created a static website from scratch using Netlify + Gatsby
item.description: After my first year working as a frontend web developer, I got the idea to have my own personal site. It’d be a platform to showcase my work, share content, and serve as a creative outlet for me outside of work. Here, I’ll walk you through my experience building the site from zero to deploy.
